title: Deleting a champ?
body: As usual they screw champs when they do reworks , can I get Riot to delete a champ I don't want?

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you submit a ticket to Player Support requesting a champion to be removed from your account, they will happily oblige. However do not expect any refund for the cost of the champion or any associated skins; for this you would have to use one of your 3 allocated refund tokens.
WOW! You can do that? I had no idea Rito would delete champs you own if asked to :)

Yup! If you have any content you don't want- skins, champions, ranked borders, etc, you can submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support, and they'll be able to remove it from your account! 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
